definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: despise (Pal. Targum [[בְּזׇא]], cf. baza0 raise the head loftily and disdainfully)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. Nu 15:31 +; [[בָּזִיתָ]] 2Sa 12:9; sf. [[בְּזִתָָנִי]] 2Sa 12:10, etc.; Impf. [[וַיִּ֫בֶז]] Ge 25:34, Es 3:6; sf. [[וַיִּבְזֵהוּ]] 1Sa 17:42; 3 fs. [[וַתִּכֶז]] 2Sa 6:16, 1Ch 15:29; 2 ms. [[תִּבְזֶה]] Ps 51:19, Ps 73:20; [[וַיִּבְזוּ]] Ne 2:19; [[וַיִּבְזֻהוּ]] 1Sa 10:27; Inf. cstr. [[בְּזׁה]] Is 49:7 (Di Ew:§ 150 b); Pt. act. [[בּוֹזֶה]] Pr 15:20, Pr 19:16; [[בּוֹזֵהוּ]] Pr 14:2; [[בּוֹזִים]] 2Ch 36:16; [[בּוֹזֵי]] Mal 1:6; sf. [[בּׂזַי]] 1Sa 2:30; pass. [[בָּזוּי]] Je 49:15 +; f. [[בְּזוּיׇה]] Ec 9:16; —despise, regard with contempt, sq. acc. rei, birthright Ge 25:34 (J); words of ´[[י]] Nu 15:31 (P; not elsewh. in Hex); 2Sa 12:9 cf. 2Ch 36:16; name of ´[[י]] Mal 1:6, Mal 1:6 (cf. infr.); oath ([[אָלָה]]) Ez Eze 16:59, Eze 17:16, Eze 17:18, Eze 17:19; holy things Ez Eze 22:8; one's own ways Pr 19:16 (i.e. is careless of them, lives recklessly, opp. [[שׁׂמֵר נַפְשׁוֹ]], cf. [[נׁחֵר דַּרְכּוֹ]] Pr 16:17); distress of the distressed Ps 22:25 (‖[[שִׁקֵּץ]], subj. ´[[י]]); prayer, subj. id. Ps 102:18; broken & contrite heart Ps 51:9 (c. [[לאׁ]]), cf. on other hand Ps 73:20; sq. acc. pers. Saul 1Sa 10:27, David 1Sa 17:42 cf. Pr 15:20, ´[[י]] 1Sa 2:30, 2Sa 12:10, Pr 14:2, his prisoners Ps 69:34 (subj. ´[[י]]); sq. [[לְ]], [[וַתִּבֶז לוֹ בְּלִבָּהּ]] 2Sa 6:16 = 1Ch 15:29, 2Ki 19:21 = Is 37:22; sq. [[עַל]] pers. Ne 2:19; sq. Inf. [[וַיִּבֶז בְּעֵינׇיו לִשְׁלֽחַ יׇד]] Es 3:6; note esp. [[בְּזׁה]] [[נֶפֶשׁ]] Is 49:7 a despising of soul, i.e. one despised from the soul, thoroughly despised; on otherviews v. Che Di. Pt. pass. despised, of pers. cstr. [[בְּזוּי עָם]] despised of people (‖[[חֶרְפַּת אָדָם]]) Ps 22:7, cf. [[בָּזוּי בָאָדָם]] Je 49:15 also Ob v:Ob 2; of wisdom Ec 9:16.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נִבְזֶה]] Ps 15:4 +; f. [[נִבְזׇה]] 1Sa 15:9 (so rd. for [[נמבזׇה]] cf. We Dr); pl. [[נִבְזִם]] Mal 2:9; —
despicable, contemptible Mal 1:7 said of table of ´[[י]], cf. v:Mal 1:12, Mal 2:9; Da 11:21 as subst. of Antiochus Epiph.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. [[לְהַבְזוֹת בַּעְלֵיהֶן]] Es 1:17 so as to cause to despise their lords (cause their lords to be despised).
